General.Name: Shanghai Zijiang Enterprise Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Zijiang Enterprise Group Co., Ltd. operates in the packaging industry in China. The company provides PET performs and bottles, crown caps, hygiene products packing, plastic labels, plastic anti-theft caps, aluminum-coated paper and cardboard, colored paper packaging and printing, film, and other packaging materials, as well as beverage material, and other products. It is involved in the real estate activities. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

2.Name: Mr. Jun  Gao
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
